events.message: The candidate has successfully submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, including resume and cover letter.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department due to relevant developer and software skills mentioned.
A recruiter specialized in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to assess experience with software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly and showed enthusiasm about the opportunity to work as a developer in our engineering team.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate their coding skills and problem-solving ability in software development.
